constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 201 (Thursday, November 18, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. ESHOO:
H.R. 6027.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, clause 3 of the U.S. Constitution,
which gives Congress the power ``to regulate commerce with
foreign nations, and among the several states, and with the
Indian tribes.''
[Page H6609]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

title: Online Privacy Act of 2021
